group.title: Pengenalan Asynchronous Di Javascript

group.title: Zsh Nomatch Command With Caret
group.author: Fahmi Achmad
group.excerpt: So today i learn that zsh on bare bones setting have this caret/(^) character filtered, causing can't execute command with that character. after some reading i came up with some solutions.
